The issue in the given code snippet is that the scrollable content is not accessible by keyboard. To fix this, you can add the `tabindex` attribute to the scrollable `div` element, allowing it to be focused with the keyboard. Here's the corrected code snippet: ```html
``` By adding `tabindex="0"`, the scrollable `div` will be included in the natural tab order of the page and can be focused using the keyboard.
